title: Ihanga Ryera ry Imana – Ihanga Ryera ry'Imana, nti turi idini canke umugambge, nti turi umuhari canke umugwi, turi IHANGA.  Turi mu gihugu cacu c'Uburundi no kw'isi yose mu mahanga. Twahamagariwe guhagararira ukuri kwose n'ukugororoka. Gukora no guteramira isezerano ry'igihugu cacu n'iry'ijuru. Har'ico ubaza, utwandikire kuri ihangaryeraryimana@gmail.com canke wandike kuri+257 68151545 no +1 914 448 3650. Umwami n'Umukiza wacu Yesu Kristo abazigame mwese!
